Name: Present
Script: Before Combat: self.innate.push(~changes into a christmas enemy each turn~);
Script: Before Start Turn: var enemy = rand([~Ghosts of Christmas~[;]~Ms. Yeti~[;]~Mall Cop~[;]~Snow Miser~[;]~Mariah Carey~[;]~Grinch~[;]~Lightning~[;]~Rudy~[;]~John Denver~[;]~Gingerbread Man~[;]~Penguin~[;]~Polar Bear~[;]~Elf~[;]~Christmas Tree~]); reunion_transform(self[;]enemy[;]true);
Last Words 1: I guess thats what I get for trying to be something I'm not

Name: Nicholas
Last Words 2: Oh your going on the naughty list

Name: Ghosts of Christmas
Script: Before Combat: var ghost = rand([~Ghost of Future~[;]~Ghost of Present~[;]~Ghost of Past~]); self.name = ghost; if(self.name == ~Ghost of Future~) { self.destroyallequipment(); giveequipment([~Space Food~[;]~Laser Rifle~[;]~Time Travel~][;]true[;]false); } if(self.name == ~Ghost of Present~) { self.destroyallequipment(); giveequipment([~Global Warming~[;]~Pollution~[;]~Time Travel~][;]true[;]false); } if(self.name == ~Ghost of Past~) { self.destroyallequipment(); giveequipment([~Tap Dance~[;]~Lead Pipe Hit~[;]~Time Travel~][;]true[;]false); }
Script: End Turn: if(self.name == ~Ghost of Future~) { self.destroyallequipment(); giveequipment([~Space Food~[;]~Laser Rifle~[;]~Time Travel~][;]true[;]false); } if(self.name == ~Ghost of Present~) { self.destroyallequipment(); giveequipment([~Global Warming~[;]~Pollution~[;]~Time Travel~][;]true[;]false); } if(self.name == ~Ghost of Past~) { self.destroyallequipment(); giveequipment([~Tap Dance~[;]~Lead Pipe Hit~[;]~Time Travel~][;]true[;]false); }

Name: Lady Luck[]
Script: Before Combat: self.innate.push(~Is Immune to shock[;] Freeze and Weaken~); inflictself(~phase1~);
Script: Before Start Turn: removestatusself(SHOCK[;] ALL); removestatusself(ICE[;] ALL); removestatusself(WEAKEN[;] ALL); removeequipment(ALL); if(getstatusself(~phase1~) > 0){ var eqs1 = rand(loadtext(~christmasspecial/finale/phase1~)).split(~[;]~); giveequipment(eqs1); } else if(getstatusself(~phase2~) > 0){ var eqs2 = rand(loadtext(~christmasspecial/finale/phase2~)).split(~[;]~); giveequipment(eqs2); } else if(getstatusself(~phase3~) > 0){ var eqs3 = rand(loadtext(~christmasspecial/finale/phase3~)).split(~[;]~); giveequipment(eqs3); }
Script: On Start Turn: if(self.hp < 35){ removestatusself(~phase2~); inflictself(~phase3~); } else if(self.hp < 70){ removestatusself(~phase1~); inflictself(~phase2~); }
First Words: You may have passed the dungeon but your |Journey ends here!||I will beat you and turn back to normal and you'll stay a dice forever!
Last Words 1: What NO! how is this possible!?||I could never lose!
Last Words 2: What NO! how is this possible!?||I could never lose!
Last Words 3: What NO! how is this possible!?||I could never lose!
Last Words (if they win): AWWWWWW Poor Mariah! time to go back to the start||[red]OR YOU COULD ACCEPT THAT YOU WILL NEVER WIN|AND STAY A DICE FOREVER
Last Words Endgame: What NO! how is this possible!?||I could never lose!
